channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Federal Government Shut Down Overnight
item.description: We also look at a gathering of generals in Washington.

item.title: U.S. Shutdown Begins, and Trump Tells Military to Use U.S. Cities as ‘Training Grounds’

item.title: Government Shutdown That May Lead to Mass Layoffs Begins
item.description: Government funding was cut off shortly after midnight in a spending deadlock that could cut essential services and lead to mass layoffs.

item.title: Oktoberfest Closed Because of Bomb Threat in Munich
item.description: The German authorities said the rare decision was taken after an earlier explosion in a residential area of the city.

item.title: Fool me once: the magical origin of the word hoax
item.description: Frauds, swindles, cons, scams, and deceptions are collectively known as hoaxes. But there's more than meets the eye.
